articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates European Council President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates European Council President
Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Herman Van Rompuy on Dec. 1 on his election as first President of the European Council.
					 Kim Yong Nam in his message wished him great success in his work for boosting the European Union, expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and the EU would further develop.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates EU High Representative
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulates EU High Representative 
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Catherine Ashton on her election as high representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and the EU would further develop in various fields, the message wished her success in her work.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Irish Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Irish Ambassador
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Eamonn Christopher Mckee, newly-appointed ambassador of Ireland to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Credentials of Irish Ambassador Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Irish Ambassador Accepted
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Irish Ambassador e. p. to the DPRK Eamonn Christopher Mckee at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday. 
					The president had a conversation with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.

articles.title: Romanian National Day Marked
articles.content:
Romanian National Day Marked
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Iancu Liviu Ovidiu, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Romanian embassy here, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Tuesday to mark the Romanian national day.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairperson of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Staff members of the Romanian embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Changgwang Street of Chain of Restaurants Renovated
articles.content:
Changgwang Street of Chain of Restaurants Renovated
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Changgwang street of a chain of restaurants in Pyongyang was successfully renovated as required by the new century in a matter of a little over a year.
					 There in the street are Korean Restaurant, Ryongwang Entrails Soup Restaurant, Changgwangsan Kuksu (Noodle) Restaurant, Rakwon Steak Restaurant, Manphung Rice-cake Soup Restaurant, Phungnyon Pancake Restaurant and other restaurants.
					
					 These restaurants have been renovated to meet people's cultural need and suit the features of each restaurant, while preserving their original architectural style. They look attractive and fashionable, keeping in perfect harmony with high-rise buildings and apartment houses of the street. 
					
					 Every restaurant is well equipped with ultra-modern cooking facilities and other kitchen utensils and service fixtures and its exterior and interior are decorated with multi-color lights. 
					
					 The restaurants were opened to visitors on Tuesday.

articles.title: Hamhung City Decorated with Electric Light
articles.content:
Hamhung City Decorated with Electric Light
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, an east coastal area of the country has turned into a fascinating world of bright lights.
					 Decorated with lamplights are Hamhung Railway Station, Orogong Street, Hamhung Grand Theatre, Sinhung Restaurant, Sinhungsan Hotel and other buildings and streets.
					
					 The Hamhung Grand Theatre, adorned with a rational combination of upward, downward, near and far-reaching floodlights by making an effective use of the experience gained in the electric light decoration projects of Pyongyang and Wonsan City, reminds the spectators of a ship sailing through waves at night.
					
					 The roof of Sinhung Restaurant is illuminated by lamps preserving its national color as a traditional Korean-style building, while the Sinhungsan Hotel with glittering lamps of various shapes.
					
					 Seen from the sea, light-decked apartment buildings and public service facilities in Orogong Street in Hungnam District look like passenger ships, big and small, at anchor in a row.
					
					 Their roofs are lit bright by rhythmic neon lamps in shapes of jumping fishes and flying seagulls.
					
					 Multistoried apartments in Thongnam Street are adorned with sodium lamps in upper part, verandas being bedecked with rhythmic lamps and walls with upward and near-reaching floodlights.
					
					 Also wonderful are decorations of public service facilities with lamp tubes, lamp lines and floodlights standing in intersections.
					
					 A new type of lamplight decoration has been applied to the whole of the 1.5km-long green belts in the centre of Sinhung Street.

articles.title: Pine-Pollen Foodstuff
articles.content:
Pine-Pollen Foodstuff
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Samilpho Specialties Factory is producing a pine-pollen foodstuff.
					 According to old books on Koryo medicine including "Tonguibogam (Encyclopedia of Traditional Medicine of Korea)," the yellow pollen of pine trees has been well known from olden times for its high medicinal efficacy.
					
					 The foodstuff made with pollen of indigenous two-leafed pine trees growing in deep forests has a pharmacological property of promoting physical strength and energy.
					
					 In particular, it is efficacious for treating circulatory diseases including heart trouble and preventing palsy, and good for purification of blood, prevention of aging and beauty treatment.
					
					 It is desirable to take it three times a day in mineral water or honeyed water. When having skin inflammation and external wound, it is applicable to the ailing parts directly.
					
					 It is popular with those who have used it.

articles.title: Sound of Bell at Dawn for Housewives
articles.content:
Sound of Bell at Dawn for Housewives
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Sounds of bell ring out at dawn in every place of Pyongyang.
					 It is the saleswomen of service sectors with badges "service workers for people" on their breasts that ring bells for housewives.
					
					 With carriers fully loaded with hot soup, various sorts of sliced vegetables preserved in soy sauce, pickled dishes and others, they go round blocks of dwelling houses ringing bells.
					
					 Housewives are glad at the convenience and passengers, though busy on the way to work, stop to praise their sincere service.
					
					 Deeply aware of their mission to serve the people, officials and workers of service sectors have built raw material storehouses, mushroom cultivation places, pickle tanks, bean sprout and bean curd production bases and side dish processing rooms in accordance with their actual condition and organize service in a proper way in order to offer convenience to residents in their daily life. 
					
					 Their morning and evening service is helpful to people in their on-going 100-day campaign.

articles.title: U.S. Termed Heinous Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
U.S. Termed Heinous Human Rights Abuser
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The United States should make an apology to the international community for its human rights abuses before talking about "human rights issues" of other countries. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday urges this in a signed article.
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The U.S. behaves as if it were an "inspector" and "judge" privileged to deal with the human rights issues of the world. It announces "annual report on human rights" every year critical of "human rights performance" of other countries.  
					
					 This "annual report" claiming "assessing" the human rights situation of the world has sparked off complicated problems worldwide as it was a smear campaign little short of interfering in the internal affairs of other countries. 
					
					 In the 1980s the U.S. attacked Grenada and Panama by force of arms and in the 1990s made an indiscriminate air raid on Yugoslavia. They were all committed under the slogan of "safeguarding human rights."    
					
					 Civilian death by the U.S. occupation troops is reported in an unbroken chain in Afghanistan and Iraq under the pretext of "purging terrorists." 
					
					 These days the world is becoming increasingly assertive calling for unveiling the human rights abuses committed by the U.S. in overseas secret prisons and closing the prison at the U.S. naval base of Guantanamo. This is a manifestation of anger and resistance of the international community against the U.S. hideous human rights abuses.
					
					 The hypocritical and deceptive nature of U.S. sophism of "protection of human rights" is clearly proved by the poor human rights record in the U.S.   
					
					 It is a revelation of the extreme impudence and arrogance for the U.S. to dare take issue with other countries' "human rights issues" while shelving its own human rights abuses although it is beset with such innumerable cases of human rights abuses as aggression upon sovereign states and killing of civilians.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Japan's "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Japan's "Human Rights" Racket
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Japan desperately worked as one of the co-sponsors of the "resolution on human rights in north Korea" at the Third Committee of the 64th UN General Assembly.
					 The above-said anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is nothing new as it was a politically motivated trite plot hatched by hostile forces against the DPRK every year, but it is extremely ridiculous for Japan to take the lead in the racket as it has the worst human rights record.
					
					 Japan is not entitled to say anything about someone's "human rights issue" as it is the only country in the world that has not yet redeemed the crimes it committed against humanity in the past.
					
					The Japanese imperialists perpetrated such hideous human rights abuses in Korea last century as massacring more than a million Koreans, forcibly drafting at least 8.4 million Koreans and forcing 200,000 Korean women into sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, in particular, is still censured by the international community as it was the most monstrous human rights abuse in the world history of wars.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists lured Korean girls with the promise to help them get "jobs" and kidnapped or forcibly took away girls working in fields and drawing water from wells and those passing by on roads. Not content with this, they kidnapped even young married women with children and 12-15 year-old girls to reduce them to "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army and massacred many of them just before Japan's defeat in a bid to cover up its crimes. 
					
					 A Japanese confessed as follows while testifying to the miserable plight of those "comfort women":
					
					"What happened several decades back is still fresh in my memory. Dozens of 'Korean comfort women' for the Imperial Japanese Army were shouting 'Help!' before drowning in the sea. At that time our superior ordered us not to help them, blustering they were no more than consumer goods and Japanese soldiers would find a plenty of them in Korea. Mere stretch of hands could have saved them.  It is my strong desire to help them get their long pent-up grudge settled. I would like to offer even a single chima and jogori, a single flower and incense stick to the grudge-bearing sea waters."
					
					 This being hard realities, the Japanese authorities have resorted to a mean and persistent trick to shamelessly cover up the coercive nature of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army enforced with government and military power involved instead of admitting and apologizing for their crimes.
					
					 Among the countries which were branded as "war criminal states" after the end of the Second World War Japan is the only country that has still refused to make apology and reparation for its war crimes. Yet, Japan is behaving as if it were a "human rights judge", unaware of where it stands. This is the height of cynicism. 
					
					 The world is stunned by the whole gamut of human rights abuses rife in the Japanese society.
					
					 Japan has been reduced to a grave yard of human rights due to an alarming number of jobless people, shocking cases of suicides, xenophobia, flesh traffic, etc. widely known to the world.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for such country to "admonish" someone over "human rights issue."
					
					 Japan is so crafty as to say this or that about the "human rights issue" in the DPRK in a bid to divert elsewhere the international community's criticism of Japan and evade its responsibility. This just reminds one of a prostitute talking about her virtue.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to stop trumpeting about the "human rights" though belatedly, well aware of its position in which it is not qualified to talk about any human rights issue unless it redeems its past crimes committed against humanity.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Deteriorating Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Deteriorating Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities were reported to have become one of the co-sponsors of what they called "resolution on human rights issue in north Korea," cooperating with unsavory forces in their plots to do harm to the DPRK at the recent session of the UN General Assembly. Earlier, they committed a dangerous armed provocation in the waters of the West Sea. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed article carried in this regard: These are absolutely intolerable as they were hideous crimes against the country and the nation. 
					 The anti-reunification forces of south Korea are making desperate efforts to steadily deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and block independent reunification, peace and prosperity, the article notes, and goes on: Mandarins of the "Ministry of Unification" are taking the lead in these moves.
					
					 It is the most hideous crime committed by the "Ministry of Unification" of south Korea against the country and the nation that they have persistently stood in the way of implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for independent reunification common to the nation, negating them. 
					
					Hyon In Thaek and his group are becoming desperate in their efforts to bring to naught the achievements made in the inter-Korean relations thanks to the above-said declarations, advertising "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" as a "policy toward the north".
					
					 The "Ministry of Unification" is considering the inter-Korean relations as a "hostage" to the solution of the nuclear issue, insisting that the north should "dismantle its nukes first," while working with bloodshot eyes to do harm to fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces. 
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that the group of the "Ministry of Unification" stoops to such extremely reckless acts as foolishly seeking to bring down even the system in the DPRK, while raising a hue and cry over what it called "contingency".
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that the inter-Korean relations can never get rid of a catastrophic phase as long as diehard anti-reunification and confrontation maniac Hyon is allowed to stay in his office.

articles.title: S. Korean Troops Hold Maneuvers for Aggression against North
articles.content:
S. Korean Troops Hold Maneuvers for Aggression against North
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The war-like forces of the south Korean puppet army are these days staging frantic war maneuvers targeted against the DPRK in the area along the forefront, according to a military source.
					 On Nov. 30 "Ssangryong Unit" of the puppet army kicked off large-scale field mobile exercise involving huge forces, tanks and armored cars with areas of Chunchon and Hwachon of south Korean Kangwon Province as an operational theatre. Armed bandits of the puppet army deployed in the area of Yongphyong-ri, Phochon City of Kyonggi Province staged a frantic actual maneuver to round off the capability for "breaking" through and "infiltrating" into the forefront and "performing combined combat mission" in a coordinated operation with civilians, government and army.
					
					 The puppet forces began deploying K-21 infantry combat armored cars at frontline units to be ready to go into action from late in November. On Nov. 27 they put into motion military trucks carrying at least 20,105 mm artillery pieces in the direction of the Military Demarcation Line from Munsan, Phaju City, kicking up war hysteria. 
					
					 On Dec. 1 and 2 artillery groups and tank units of the puppet army fired more than 200 shells while its armed bandits fired over 12,000 large-caliber machine-gun and automatic rifle bullets, inciting a war atmosphere.
					
					 On Dec. 1 formations of helicopter gun ships, assault planes and fighter bombers of the puppet armed forces were busy with drills for airlifting operation, striking targets and an exercise for providing close air support to ground attack units.
					
					 The madcap maneuvers for a war of aggression against the north being staged by the war-like forces of the south Korean puppet army in the area along the forefront are a blatant challenge to the desire of all the fellow countrymen for independence and reunification and an intolerable criminal act of straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK Exhibition Opened in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Exhibition Opened in Russia
Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition was opened in Russia on Nov. 25 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, books and photos on the revolutionary exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and books, photos and handicrafts introducing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 Attending its opening ceremony were personages of different strata including the mayor of Artyom, the delegate of the Russian Foreign Ministry in Vladivostok, and the director for International Cooperation and Tourism of the Maritime Territorial Administration and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Affection for Rickshaw Puller
articles.content:
Affection for Rickshaw Puller
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- It happened in the early summer of Juche 35 (1946) that the anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk left on foot for a hospital to show the relapsing wound she had got during the guerrilla warfare, refusing doctor's visit and car.
					 Seeing her walking with difficulty not long after, an official called a rickshaw and suggested her to take it. 
					
					 She cast compassionate eyes to the rickshaw puller who was bent with years, and admonished the official to the following effect: We had not fought, grubbing up the roots of plants to satisfy our starving hunger and sleeping on snow, for haughtily taking a rickshaw after the liberation of the country. We must struggle not to carry someone on rickshaw but to eradicate such inequality.
					
					 Looking with heartache at the rickshaw puller who had been subjected to all sorts of insults in the bygone days, she persuaded him to live a worthwhile life, working at a factory for the building of a new country instead of pulling a rickshaw.
					
					 Her warm affection moved to tears the old man who had regarded it as his destiny to draw a rickshaw for the half of his life.
					
					 After then the rickshaw pullers disappeared in the streets of the city and worked at factories and construction sites as masters of new Korea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador irlandes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador irlandes
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Eamonn Christopher Mckee presento el dia 2 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Irlanda en Corea.
					Luego de recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Inaugurada avenida de restaurantes Changgwang
articles.content:
Inaugurada avenida de restaurantes Changgwang
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia primero la avenida de restaurantes Changgwang, reconstruida magnificamente a la altura del nuevo siglo en un ano y pico.
					En ella estan distribuidos en filas el Restaurante de Platos Coreanos, el de Sopas de Visceras Ryongwang, el de Fideos Changgwangsan, el de Carne Asada Rakwon, el de Sopa de Tok Manphung, el de Tortilla Phungnyon, etc.
					
					La obra de reconstruccion se llevo a cabo manteniendo la original forma arquitectonica de los restaurantes y las peculiaridades de cada uno de estos y satisfaciendo la demanda cultural de los habitantes.
					
					Por eso, la avenida luce mas ligera y refinada en perfecta combinacion con altos edificios y viviendas perifericos.
					
					Los restaurantes se han dotado esta vez de ultramodernos aparatos de cocina, nuevas vasijas y otras utilidades del servicio y quedaron decorados excelentemente por dentro y por fuera con lamparillas electricas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda a EE.UU. pedir perdon por violacion de DDHH
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda a EE.UU. pedir perdon por violacion de DDHH
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos debe confesar y pedir perdon ante la sociedad internacional por sus crimenes de violacion de DDHH, antes de acusar a otros paises del mismo problema. 
					  Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado en su edicion de este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					  EE.UU. actua como si fuera "inspector" y "juez" con el privilegio de tratar el problema de DDHH del mundo entero publicando cada ano el llamado "informe anual sobre DDHH" para censurar de una manera u otra la "situacion de DDHH" de otros paises. 
					
					  La publicacion de ese "informe", que supuestamente evalua la situacion de DDHH del mundo, causa complicados problemas en el ambito internacional porque significa la difamacion y calumnia de caracter intervencionista sobre otros paises. 
					
					  Bajo el pretexto de la "defensa de DDHH", el imperio cometio la invasion armada sobre Granada y Panama en la decada de 1980 y el ataque aereo indiscriminado contra Yugoslavia en la decada de 1990. 
					
					  Hoy dia, las tropas ocupantes norteamericanas siguen matando a los civiles en Afganistan e Iraq bajo el rotulo de la "purga de terroristas". 
					
					  Ultimamente, se alzan las voces en la palestra internacional demandando revelar los crimenes violatorios de DDHH cometidos por EE.UU. en sus carceles secretas montadas en el extranjero y cerrar el reclusorio en su base naval de Guantanamo. 
					
					  Se puede decir que esto refleja la indignacion y la oposicion de la sociedad internacional a los brutales crimenes de EE.UU. contra los DDHH.
					
					  Ademas, la critica situacion de DDHH dada en el territorio norteamericano demuestra cuan hipocrita y enganoso es el canturreo de este imperio sobre la "defensa de los mismos".
					
					  Resulta sumamente cinica y altanera la conducta de EE.UU. que cuestiona a sus caprichos el "problema de DDHH" de otros paises ocultando sus incontables defectos en esta materia como la agresion a los Estados soberanos y la matanza de civiles en estos.

articles.title: ATCC condena "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" de Japon
articles.content:
ATCC condena "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" de Japon
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Japon maniobro perversamente para aprobar la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el tercer comite del 64o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU siendo pais principal de su iniciativa.
					Tal alboroto de "DDHH" es una intriga politica acostumbrada que arman cada ano las fuerzas hostiles contra la RPDC y como tal eso no es un nuevo. Pero, es asqueroso que Japon, caudillo de la violacion de DDHH actua con frenesi en la delantera.
					
					Este pais isleno es el unico que no ha liquidado todavia sus crimenes anti-eticos cometidos en el pasado y no tiene el derecho a hablar de "DDHH" de alguien.
					
					La masacre de mas de un millon de coreanos, el secuestro forzoso de mas de 8 millones de 400 mil coreanos y el reclutamiento de 200 mil coreanas para "consoladoras" del ejercito japones, perpetrados en Corea por el imperialismo japones en el siglo pasado, son crimenes de DDHH de tipo archi-grande.
					
					En particular, el crimen de "consoladoras" para el ejercito japones es el de la cruel violacion de DDHH nunca visto en la historia de guerra del mundo y es objeto de la condenacion de la sociedad internacional tambien hoy.
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses enganaron a las coreanas bajo el pretexto de "ofrecer el empleo" y secuestraron y reclutaron a la ventura a las muchachas que trabajaban en el campo, las que iban por agua y las que andaban el camino e incluso a las mujeres jovenes que tenian los ninos y las ninas de 12 - 15 anos de edad como "consoladoras" para sus tropas y las mataron en colectivo inmediatamente antes de su derrota para ocultar sus crimenes.
					
					Un japones testimonio el aspecto tragico de las consoladoras como sigue:
					
					"No me desaparece durante decenas de anos la cosa de aquel tiempo. Decenas de consoladoras coreanas gritaban en el mar 'socorro'. En aquel momento nuestro superior nos ordeno que 'las consoladoras coreanas son articulos de consumo. En Corea hay mucho tales mujeres. !No las salven! Fue posible salvarlas si se les dan las manos... Deseo disipar la cosa acumulada en el corazon durante largo tiempo. Quero poner sobre el mar impregnado del rencor de ellas aunque fuera una Chima y jogori (ropa coreana para la mujer), un ramo de flor y un incienso".
					
					A pesar de tal hecho, las autoridades japonesas, en lugar de reconocer y pedir disculpa por sus crimenes, maniobran pueril y obstinadamente con el fin de negar descaradamente hasta hoy el caracter forzoso de sus crimenes de "consoladoras" para las tropas japonesas por las autoridades del gobierno y el ejercito.
					
					Entre los "paises criminales de guerra" despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, solo Japon niega la disculpa y recompensacion por sus crimenes de guerra. Es la cosa ridicula que tal pais isleno actua como si fuera un "juez de DDHH" sin tomar en consideracion su situacion.
					
					Tambien los actos de violacion de DDHH de todo genero que reinan en la sociedad de Japon asombran a todo el mundo.
					
					Debido al numero de los desempleados, el de las suicidas, el chovinismo a otra nacion y los traficos de seres humanos y otros, Japon esta calificado del pais que carece de los DDHH.
					
					   El pais isleno habla de "DDHH" de alguien, lo cual no pasa de ser una conducta que no conviene a la situacion de ese pais.
					
					   Para desviar la vista de la sociedad internacional y liberarse de la responsabilidad de los crimenes cometidos en el pasado Japon actua asi. Esto es igual a la palabreria de una prostituta en cuanto a la castidad.
					
					Japon debe darse clara cuenta de que no tiene derecho a hablar de ningun DDHH antes de liquidar sus crimenes anti-eticos del pasado, y actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la banda de traidores del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la banda de traidores del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El rotativo Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual difundido el dia 2, se refiere a que en la Asamblea General de la ONU recien efectuada, las autoridades del Sur de Corea presentaron en comun la "resolucion sobre los derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" incorporandose al complot de las fuerzas malsanas  tendentes a denigrar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y perpetraron la peligrosisima provocacion armada en el Mar Oeste de Corea y denuncia que tal conducta del Sur de Corea no puede ser tolerada jamas como el crimen que traiciona la patria y la nacion.
					Las fuerzas anti-reunificacion del Sur de Corea maniobran freneticamente para empeorar de continuo las relaciones con el Norte de Corea y poner obstaculos ante el camino para la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad, subraya el articulista y continua:
					
					En la delantera de tales tejemanejes se ponen los compinches del "Ministerio de Reunificacion".
					
					Esta "dependencia" niega la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre que son programas conjuntos para la reunificacion independiente de la nacion y obstaculiza obstinadamente su ejecucion.
					
					Hyon In Thaek y otros compinches definieron la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3 mil dolares" como la "politica con respecto al Norte de Corea" y actuan locamente para volcar los exitos de las relaciones intercoreanas preparadas por dichas declaraciones.
					
					Al hablar de la "renuncia nuclear, primero", ellos toman las relaciones intercoreanas por "rehen" de la solucion del problema nuclear y actuan con ojos inyectados de sangre para danar a los compatriotas en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Lo comprueba que las pandillas de ese "ministerio" cometen los actos extremadamente temerarios que codician nuestro regimen, hablando del "cambio repentino de la situacion".
					
					Esta claro que mientras el monstruoso maniaco de confrontacion anti-reunifacion Hyon trabaja de ministro de "Reunificacion", las relaciones intercoreanas nunca podran ser liberadas del estado catastrofico.
